page.title: 17THE COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: THE TROWBRIDGE COMMUNITY CENTRE WAS BUILT IN 1971 AND OPENED BY PRINCE CHARLES IN 1973.HE GAVE THE CENTRE A GREEN PLAQUE WHICH HE UNVEILED AT THE OPENING CEREMONY.AT THE BACK OF THE BUILDING THERE IS A WALL PAINING OF A JUNGLE SCENE WHICH PRINCE CHARLES SIGNED.IN THE YARD THERE IS ALSO A LARGE STONE MODEL OF A DRAGON WHICH THE CHILDREN PLAY ON. MY MUM GOES TO THE CENTRE AND PLAYS BINGO THREE TIMES A WEEK.DISCO'S, PARTIE'S,FETE'S AND KEEP FIT CLASSES ARE ALSO HELD THERE AND IT IS A NICE AND ENJOYABLE PLACE TO VISIT.
